body:
So I was editing my pictures on avicus, and I can change my Gravatar, but I can not seem to be able to change my background images. Whenever I do, a bunch of code stuff pops up. Im not too sure if its just me, but I can see other peoples backgrounds. Just looking for an explanation, please.

-Optic
body_tagged:

title: Personal Profile

replies.body: Happened to me at one point. The only thing I can think of is the image is too big? I don't know thats my only thing I can think of. Hope that helped :)
